long_description: The REI InCamp 6 Tent is a weatherproof refuge that packs small and lets you customize your campground coverage when you add an InCamp shelter and other accessories. Walk-in front door is designed to dock under the edge of an InCamp Shelter 100 (sold separately); a smaller door provides access from the rear. Double-lobed doors can be opened on either side or zipped fully open; each door can also stow inside a stuff pocket. Front and rear vestibules provide covered storage; front vestibule's door can also be staked out as an awning (poles sold separately). Windproof wall fabric blocks blowing sand, while mesh windows and a roof vent provide fresh air. Efficient rectangular floor plan makes it easy to arrange sleeping bags and gear. Clips, pole sleeves and a stable aluminum frame make setup simple. Multiple pockets and hang loops help organize the interior. The InCamp 6 Tent comes with a convenient duffel-style storage sack, stakes, guylines and tighteners, as well as a pole-repair tube, a pole bag and a stake bag. The REI InCamp 6 Tent Footprint is sold separately.
short_description: The REI InCamp 6 Tent is a weatherproof refuge that packs small and lets you customize your campground coverage when you add an InCamp shelter and other accessories.
